  • Embodied Energy Embodied energy is the energy consumed by all of the processes associated with the production of a material, from the mining and processing of natural resources to manufacturing, transport and product delivery. This infographic helps visualize and compare the embodied energy of different building materials.
    2015
    Non-commercial n/a
